mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE telephone=#{telephone} AND password=#{password}
SELECT profile_img FROM user_info WHERE user_if = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(telephone, password, email, register_time) VALUES(#{telephone}, #{password}, #{email}, #{registerTime})

INSERT INTO user_info(user_id, user_name, age, sex, birthday, intro, profile_img, balance, region, collection_num, fans_num, follow_num, goods_num) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{intro}, #{profileImg}, #{balance}, #{region}, #{collectionNum}, #{followNum}, #{fansNum}, #{goodsNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET profile_img=#{profileImg} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
UPDATE user SET password=#{password} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
